response_parsed.title: Harden Data Pipelines Using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide demonstrates how to secure and harden data pipelines by leveraging the features of FastAPI, a modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.12+.
key_points: Implement input validation using schema-driven development
Utilize dependency injection to manage dependencies
Enable CORS and rate limiting for API security
Use environment variables for secure configuration management
Employ JWT authentication for user access control

code_examples.code:
from fastapi import FastAPI, Depends, CORS
app = FastAPI(title='Data Pipeline API', cors_origins='*')

version_notes: This guide is written for Python 3.12+ and utilizes the latest FastAPI version (FastAPI v0.76.0 at the time of writing)
For previous versions of FastAPI, adjustments to code may be required
caveats: Ensure that all external dependencies (e.g., databases) are properly secured
Always follow best practices for security and hardening your data pipeline
